Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கற்றுக்கண் அஞ்சான் செலச்சொல்லிக் காலத்தால் தக்கது அறிவதாம் தூது.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: He is an ambassador who having studied (politics) talks impressively, is not afraid of angry looks, and knows (to employ) the art suited to the time.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: An envoy stands before a wrathful foreign king, who is glaring at him with angry, intimidating eyes.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The envoy, however, is completely fearless ('கண் அஞ்சான்'). He is learned ('கற்று'), and speaks his message persuasively ('செலச்சொல்லி'). Crucially, a celestial clock is shown behind him, and the envoy is acting in perfect sync with the opportune moment it indicates ('காலத்தால் தக்கது அறிவது').
Layered_Composition.Background: Because he has chosen the perfect moment to speak, his fearless and persuasive words are shown to be calming the king's anger, leading to a successful outcome.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A true envoy is learned, speaks persuasively, is fearless of the anger of others, and above all, knows the right time to say the right thing.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The angry glare of the king represents the pressure. The envoy's calm, fearless face is the counterpoint. The celestial clock represents the critical element of timing.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The king is lit with a harsh, angry red light. The envoy is lit with a calm, confident, cool blue or white light. The celestial clock glows with a golden light of opportunity.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dramatic confrontation shot, focusing on the eyes of the king and the envoy.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast, color-coded lighting to represent the emotional states.

Cultural_Anchors: Knowing the Right Time ('காலத்தால் தக்கது அறிவது')

Negative_Prompt: scared envoy, happy king, text artifacts, cartoonish.
